name: Backlash
description: Summon an expanding beam of pure sunlight to doom an enemy, dealing 1161 Magic Damage to them and copying all their damage taken from you for 6 seconds and releasing 50% of it as additional Magic Damage to them.  Maximum copied damage: 3150. This value scales off your Spell Damage.
